HPA fill scales

scale_fill_hpa.Rd

scale_fill_hpa() creates a ggplot2 scale for fill aesthetics using the color palettes from the Human Protein Atlas (HPA) project.

Usage

scale_fill_hpa(palette)

Arguments

palette

The name of the palette to use. It should be one of the palettes from get_hpa_palettes().

Value

A ggplot2 scale for fill aesthetics.

Examples

# Create an example dataframe
data <- data.frame(
  Sex = c("M", "F"),
  Count = c(60, 40)
)

# Create a plot
plot <- ggplot2::ggplot(data, ggplot2::aes(x = Sex, y = Count, fill = Sex)) +
  ggplot2::geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge")
plot


# Add a custom palette
plot + scale_fill_hpa("sex_hpa")
